H0.text: Time is the unit represented by the ounce, the pound, and the ton.

H1.text: Weight is the unit for the ounce, the pound, and the ton.

H2.text: Length is the unit of the ounce, the pound, and the ton.

H3.text: Distance is the unit of the ounce, the pound, and the ton.

A4.text: An ounce is any of several units of mass.
